text:
Carlypso - San Carlos, CA - ONSITE | Node.js Engingeer & Designer

https://angel.co/carlypso/jobs/69469-node-js-engineer

https://angel.co/carlypso/jobs/73328-designer

Carlypso is a bay-area startup that is transforming the used car retail industry. For the first time, work with an advocate in your car buying process. Purchase the latest makes and models for $2,500 below competing dealers, all with guaranteed quality, and peace of mind. All of our cars pass a rigorous series of inspections and come with a thirty day money-back guarantee. Financing is available on nearly all vehicles.
